alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:36PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Santa Rosa and southeastern Escambia Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 134 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Bagdad, moving southeast at 25 mph. Another strong storms was noted just west of Garcon Point also moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ferry Pass, Ensley, Pace, Milton, Bagdad, Navarre, Pea Ridge, Roeville, Floridatown and Point Baker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
